title: Prototyping Open Participatory Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A science education design competency enhancement program applying an open development model for pre-service/prospective teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply an open prototyping process to science education design and perform three or more iterative improvement cycles.
Learners can execute the process of collecting and analyzing peer feedback using smartphone-based collaboration tools with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more specific action plans for revising the educational prototype based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
